Taunton.Job Knapp House:
The Job Knapp House is a historic house located at 81 Shores Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It is a 1-1/2 story wood-framed structure, five bays wide, with a side gable gambrel roof, a central chimney, and wood shingle siding. It has a narrow wood plank door flanked by sidelight windows.
